Flow.description: Flow is triggered of 'Submit for Approval' custom button to validate approval parameters and guide users. Part of the flow is to update request note and pricing In previous version V17, the original approval process has stopped working Network_Connection_Change_Request_Approv. Error element CLNE_Upgrade_Approval (FlowActionCall). No applicable approval process was found.

formulas.name: Formula_Types
formulas.expression: IF(TEXT({!sObjCase.Type})="CLNE Change Request","Correct",IF(TEXT({!sObjCase.Type})="Circuit Change Request","Correct",IF(TEXT({!sObjCase.Type})="Circuit & CLNE Change Request","Correct","Incorrect")))

Flow.label: Network Upgrade

value.stringValue: Complex Access speed/ CLNE Upgrade/ downgrade (5D)

fields.name: Prompt
fields.fieldText:
Hi there,
An error has been detected and the Administrator has been notified.
The Administrator will need to investigate and only once you are given the go ahead can you re-attempt submitting this request for approval

textTemplates.text:
Hi there,
The following case {!sObjCase.CaseNumber} has been submitted for network approval, please review and check that pricing has been captured accordingly
Thanks

textTemplates.name: Instructions
textTemplates.text: . To exit simply close this window . To see updates on case please refresh case window
